responses_by_article.article_title: A Pricing Framework for Software-as-a-Service
responses_by_article.question_text: What currency and billing periodicity are used in the software business model as described in the article?
responses_by_article.extracted_value: USD currency. Billing periodicity: monthly is most popular, with options for annual and multiple payment frequencies. 67.2% use single payment frequency, 30% use multiple frequencies with bulk payment discounts.
responses_by_article.source_citation: Page 1: 'the global SaaS market is expected to reach 12.1 billion USD by 2014' | Page 3: 'Monthly subscription fees are the most popular pricing model nowadays' | Page 2, Table I: 'Payment Frequency based. Does pricing refer to multiple frequency of recurring payment (e.g., monthly, annual, etc.)?' | Page 2: 'clients are charged for only what they have utilized, usually on a periodic basis' | Page 5: '67.2% of the vendors used single payment frequency, while 30% used multiple payment frequency options and complementary bulk payment discount incentive'
